org.mini2Dx.core.engine.geom

Class CollisionBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Rectangle
        • org.mini2Dx.core.engine.geom.CollisionBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.math.Shape2D, java.io.Serializable, Positionable, Updatable, Parallelogram, Shape

    public class CollisionBox
extends Rectangle
implements Positionable
    An implementation of Rectangle that allows for interpolation. Game objects can use this class to move around the game world and retrieve the appropriate rendering coordinates after interpolating between the previous and current position.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
